value.title: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
value.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

value.title: Protect your identities with Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Use the advanced detection and remediation of identity-based threats to protect your Azure Active Directory identities and applications from compromise.

value.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration
value.excerpt: Learn how to protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration

value.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
value.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.

value.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI in government
value.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for governments, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the public sector.

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Find out about the Azure Batch capabilities designed to help you efficiently run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications in the cloud.

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks

value.title: Deploy applications by using MSIX app attach for Windows Virtual Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to deliver applications using MSIX app attach technology. MSIX app attach is an application delivery technology that separates applications and their state from the operating system and assigns applications to users dynamically.

value.title: Secure a Windows Virtual Desktop deployment
value.excerpt: Introduction to Microsoft security capabilities that can keep your applications and data secure in your Windows Virtual Desktop deployment.

value.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 overview | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: James Baker joins Lara Rubbelke to introduce Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2, which is redefining cloud storage for big data analytics due to multi-modal (object store and file system) access and combining the best qualities of a dedicated analytics file system with those of a cloud-scale object store.

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman
value.excerpt: Kirill Gavrylyuk stops by Azure Friday to talk Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman. Watch quick overview of the industry's first globally distributed multi-model database service followed by a demo of moving an existing MongoDB app to Cosmos DB with a single config change.  For more information, see: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/cosmos-db/.

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Event Grid
value.excerpt: Bahram Banisadr introduces Scott Hanselman to Azure Event Grid, which is a fully-managed event service for managing events across many different Azure services and applications. Made for performance and scale, it simplifies building event-driven applications and serverless architectures.   Azure Event

value.title: Azure Purview: New connectors, Synapse integration, enhanced business glossary, etc. | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to show him what's new in Azure Purview since it was released in public preview in December 2020. value.title: Cognitive Search - Azure Search with AI | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jacob Jedryszek joins Scott Hanselman to talk about about using Cognitive Services with Azure Search with your mobile and web apps. Skip hiring search experts who know what an inverted index is. Don't worry about distributed systems expertise to scale your service to handle large amount of data. And
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kw8SHwxp9c" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: How to add the Azure Cloud Shell to Visual Studio Code | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to add the Azure Cloud Shell to Visual Studio Code. value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01
